marklogic.body:
The picture they keep posting of the victim is several years old. This child was much larger than what they are telling us and managed to break the shooters nose and wrestle him to the point the shooter had grass stains on the back of his clothing.
So, once again the Main Stream Media can't be trusted not to poisin the well of openmindedness.
One last thing to the moronic Miami Heat. Instead of dressing like gangstas for your "photo-op", how about cleaning up your and sending a message to inner city youth to NOT dress/ like gangstas? How about sending a message that to Act like that even in jest is to risk becomming very dead?
